title: Where rainbows meet: Fairy Springs, Rotarua, New Zealand
brief_description: Item 1. Where rainbows meet. Fairy Springs, Rotorua New Zealand. Feeding rainbow trout (by hand) in crystal spring near Rotorua. Item 2. Who’s who at the zoo. Item 3. Nature’s Power House in NZ Geyserland — in Wairakei. Geyser Valley - boiling mud. Item 4. Gannet City - Cape Kidnappers N. Z. Item 5. Lake of a Thousand Isles - Lake Manapouri, NZ.
